About Light7

light7 is a fork a Framework7. It's more simple and easy to use than framework7, and better compatibility on android.

Not Reinvent Wheels

We don't reinvent wheels. Ligth7 is forked from Framework7, refer some other open source UI Lib:

  • Ratchet
  • Fastclick
  • MSUI

compatibility

iOS 6+, Android 4.0+

If you find any bug, create an issue on github please.
